BUMP¶

class task_button.Task_Button(bump: task_share.Share, buttons: ButtonArray)¶

The Task_Button task continuously monitors the ButtonArray object and reads the state of all bump sensors, and updates a shared bump, based on if any single bump sensor was pressed or not.

Parameters:

  • bump – A Share that reads False if just one bump sensor in the array was pressed, True otherwise

  • buttons – ButtonArray object of all bump sensors.

task()¶

Generator Function to run implemented Finite-State Machine

MECHA03 ROMI
